gram.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the basic unit for measuring weight in the metric system
gram.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a message delivered as an amusing surprise
gram.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: On his birthday we sent him a kissagram  (=a woman who was paid to give him a message and kiss him).
